name: Car For Sale Simulator 2023
description:
You can buy vehicles according to your budget from the car market in the town and the neighborhood. Vehicles may be crashed, you can repair and sell them.
Remember to keep your vehicles safe, thieves can steal your vehicles.
By cleaning dirty vehicles, you can increase your customers' interest in vehicles.
By improving your gallery, you can secure it by getting more vehicle space, security cameras, guards and exterior doors.

In the evening, you can go home with your car and sleep.
If you do not have a car, you can travel to wherever you want using the bus stops by paying the bus fee.

Do not forget to follow your taxes and invoices with your tablet. You can take a loan from the bank and improve your office. At the same time, you can take a photo of your vehicle and post an advertisement to sell it.
